verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, remember \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* meekness.

How \w he|strong="H0518"\w* swore \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* vowed \w a|strong="H0518"\w* vow \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob:

If \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* enter \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* house: if \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* go \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* bed wherein \w I|strong="H5704"\w* lie:
If I shall give sleep to my eyes, or slumber to my eyelids,
Or rest to my temples: until I find out a place for the Lord, a tabernacle for the God of Jacob.
Behold we have heard of it in Ephrata: we have found it in the fields of the wood.
We will go into his tabernacle: We will adore in the place where his feet stood.
Arise, O Lord, into thy resting place: thou and the ark, which thou hast sanctified.
Let thy priests be clothed with justice: and let thy saints rejoice.
For thy servant Davidâ€™s sake, turn not away the face of thy anointed.
The Lord hath sworn truth to David, and he will not make it void: of the fruit of thy womb I will set upon thy throne.
If thy children will keep thy covenant, and these my testimonies which I shall teach them: Their children also for evermore shall sit upon thy throne.
For the Lord hath chosen Sion: he hath chosen it for his dwelling.
This is my rest for ever and ever: here will I dwell, for I have chosen it.
Blessing, I will bless her widow: I will satisfy her poor with bread.
I will clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall rejoice with exceeding great joy.
There will I bring forth a horn to David: I have prepared a lamp for my anointed.
His enemies I will clothe with confusion: but upon him will my sanctification flourish.
